an7.26:4.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha … pe …
an7.26:4.3: katame ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihāniyā dhammā?
an7.26:4.5: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an7.26:5.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvessanti … pe …
an7.26:5.7: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an7.26:6.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihāniyā dhammā bhikkhūsu ṭhassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihāniyesu dhammesu bhikkhū sandississanti;
an7.26:6.2: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī”ti.
